conclusion: Understanding direction and angle of light source affects shadows
Shadow A is cast by the object at the top right, light source in front, shadow cast to the back
Shadow B is cast by the cake, light source in front, shadow cast to the back
Shadow C is cast by the roll of paper, light source in front, shadow cast to the back
Shadow D is cast by the ring, light source in front, shadow cast to the back
Light source moves to back right, direction changes to back right to front left
Change in light direction affects position and size of shadows
Shadow A will be cast to the front left, size and position depend on distance and angle
Shadow B will be cast to the front left, size and position depend on distance and angle
Shadow C will be cast to the front left, size and position depend on distance and angle
Shadow D will be cast to the front left, size and position depend on distance and angle
Final answer: Shadows A, B, C, D move to front left, size and position depend on distance and angle
